defines



C_PI_F

#define C_PI_F (3.141592f)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: 32-bit float value of Pi

C_PI_D

#define C_PI_D (3.141592653589793)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: 64-bit double value of Pi

C_EPSILON_D

#define C_EPSILON_D 0.000000000000002
type: C preprocessor definition
description: precision for double almost equal

C_EPSILON_F

#define C_EPSILON_F 0.000001f
type: C preprocessor definition
description: precision for float almost equal

C_RADIANS_TO_DEGREES_D

#define C_RADIANS_TO_DEGREES_D 57.295779513082320
type: C preprocessor definition

C_DEGREES_TO_RADIANS_D

#define C_DEGREES_TO_RADIANS_D 0.017453292519943
type: C preprocessor definition

C_RADIANS_TO_DEGREES_F

#define C_RADIANS_TO_DEGREES_F 57.295779f
type: C preprocessor definition

C_DEGREES_TO_RADIANS_F

#define C_DEGREES_TO_RADIANS_F 0.017453f
type: C preprocessor definition

mptrf

#define mptrf(x) (float*)&(x)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: get math struct as float pointer

mptrd

#define mptrd(x) (double*)&(x)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: get math struct as double pointer
